sentences.english: Pod transport technology is even starting gain some stateside attention.
sentences.chinese: 豆荚车运输技术甚至引起了美国的关注。

sentences.english: Rattling around like four peas in a pod.
sentences.chinese: 我们就像被夹在豆荚里的四颗豆子，飘摇不定。

sentences.english: They're as alike as two peas in a pod.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常相象，就象一个豆荚里的两颗豌豆。

sentences.english: And how do these puny pods protect your face?
sentences.chinese: 这些小小豆荚如何保护你的肌肤呢？

sentences.english: Jojoba oil comes from the beans of the shrub like plant, simmondsia chinensis.
sentences.chinese: 荷荷巴油提取自西蒙得木灌丛的豆荚。

sentences.english: The most obvious example is that surplus energy created by the pod can be used to charge the car.
sentences.chinese: 最明显的例子是由豆荚产生的能量可以给电车充电。

sentences.english: He started tipping the pea pods into a pan.
sentences.chinese: 他开始把豌豆荚倒进锅中。

sentences.english: The language they spoke was unrecognized and they ate only bean pods.
sentences.chinese: 他们说的语言尚未被辨识，而且他们只吃豆荚。

sentences.english: In summer there are red flowers. In autumn, long bean-fruit will form.
sentences.chinese: 凤凰木夏天时开红花，秋天时会长出豆荚。

sentences.english: Later they break open the pods to remove the beans.
sentences.chinese: 然后破开豆荚取出可可豆。

sentences.english: The Peapod system has made life easier for a great many people.
sentences.chinese: 豆荚的网上购物系统使得很多人的生活变得方便。

sentences.english: The young bug eat by moth into the pod, eat up bean and other pods transfer after harm.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫蛀入豆荚，吃尽豆粒后又转移为害其他豆荚。

sentences.english: The young bug eat by moth into the pod, eat up bean and other pods transfer after harm.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫蛀入豆荚，吃尽豆粒后又转移为害其他豆荚。

sentences.english: A boiled potato and buttered string beans, sir.
sentences.chinese: 煮马铃薯和涂奶油的豆荚，先生。

sentences.english: A dry dehiscent fruit derived from a single carpel and usually opening along two lines of dehiscence as a pea pod.
sentences.chinese: 由单个心皮形成的通常沿两条缝开裂的干果，如豆荚。

sentences.english: Cacao pods, which grow on trees, originated in Central and South America.
sentences.chinese: 可可豆荚以树的形态生长，原产于中南美洲。

definition: broad bean (Vicia faba)/fava bean/also written 蠶豆|蚕豆[can2 dou4]
